title: How to Make Chickpea and Red Bean Salad

steps.headline: Combine the chickpeas, beans, chopped peppers, chopped tomatoes and chopped onion in a bowl.
Make the dressing.
steps.description: Mix the lemon juice, olive oil, crushed garlic, honey and chilli paste together. Season to taste.

steps.headline: Pour the dressing over the salad.
Refrigerate the salad for half an hour or longer prior to serving.
Add the parsley just prior to serving.
steps.description: Toss through gently. Season with ground pepper if wished.

text: Combine the chickpeas, beans, chopped peppers, chopped tomatoes and chopped onion in a bowl.  Make the dressing. Mix the lemon juice, olive oil, crushed garlic, honey and chilli paste together. Season to taste. Pour the dressing over the salad. Toss gently. Refrigerate the salad for half an hour or longer prior to serving.  Add the parsley just prior to serving. Toss through gently. Season with ground pepper if wished. Finished.
